"Leso": "Giving better materials to stronger ARKS is about building core competency."
"Some might think that it's unfair, but supplies are limited out here, so..."
"Also... as someone who's not very good at fighting, I've always really admired strong ARKS like you..."
"So I want to help out however I can, as my own way of cheering all of you on from the sidelines..."
"Well, jumping right into things, I'd like you to take out some Crocodallus in Northern Kvaris..."
"Well, jumping right into things, I'd like you to take out a Crocodallus..."
"Crocodalli... have very large bodies... They certainly make for strong opponents."
"I will be watching very intently... to see how you defeat those enemies."
"They can mainly be found in Bergana Ruins..."
